html.p: Data Collection: Use Trend Vision One for Splunk (XDR) for collecting Trendmicro data.

search.query: `cs_trendmicro` sourcetype="xdr_audit" | sort -loggedTime | eval event_time = strftime(strptime(loggedTime, "%FT%TZ"), "%F %T %Z") | `cs_user_privilege_mapping(user)` | table event_time user role access category activity result is_privileged_user
`cs_trendmicro` sourcetype="xdr_oat" | rename "filter.level" as Severity | dedup Severity | table Severity

`cs_trendmicro` sourcetype="xdr_oat" | search "endpoint.ips{}"="$tkn_device_ip$" "endpoint.name"="$tkn_device_name$" "filter.level"="$tkn_severity$" | sort -detectionTime | eval event_time = strftime(strptime(detectionTime, "%FT%TZ"), "%F %T %Z") | table event_time "filter.name" "detail.logonUser{}" "filter.level" "endpoint.ips{}" "Device Name" "filter.techniques{}" "filter.tactics{}" "detail.processFilePath" | rename "filter.name" as Detection, "detail.logonUser{}" as LoggedIn_User, "filter.level" as Severity, "endpoint.ips{}" as "Device IP", endpoint.name as "Device Name", "filter.techniques{}" as Techniques, "filter.tactics{}" as Tactics, "detail.processFilePath" as Processed_FilePath | fillnull value="-"

| rename user AS Account, role AS Role, access AS Source, category AS Category, activity AS Activity, result AS Result | search Account="$tkn_account$" Activity="$tkn_activity$" Result="$tkn_result$" Role="$tkn_role$"

`cs_trendmicro` sourcetype=xdr_audit activity="Remove agent" role != "Master Administrator" | `cs_user_privilege_mapping(user)` | eval event_time = strftime(strptime(loggedTime, "%FT%TZ"), "%F %T %Z") | table event_time "details.Deleted agents{}.hostname" "details.Deleted agents{}.xdrDeviceId" category result role user is_privileged_user | rename loggedTime as Loggeed, "details.Deleted agents{}.hostname" as "Device Name", "details.Deleted agents{}.xdrDeviceId" as "Device ID"

`cs_trendmicro` sourcetype=xdr_alerts_wb signature="Ransomware Behavior Detection" | dedup id | search status="Open" | eval event_time = strftime(strptime(createdDateTime, "%FT%TZ"), "%F %T %Z") | table app event_time dest incidentId score status

`cs_trendmicro` sourcetype=xdr_audit activity="Remote Shell" role != "Master Administrator" | `cs_user_privilege_mapping(user)` | eval event_time = strftime(strptime(loggedTime, "%FT%TZ"), "%F %T %Z") | table event_time "details.Activity" "details.Command{}" "details.Host name" role result user is_privileged_user | rename "details.Activity" as Activity, "details.Command{}" as Command, "details.Host name" as HostName

`cs_trendmicro` sourcetype=xdr_audit activity IN ("Delete API Key", "Delete suspicious object", "Delete workspace") | `cs_user_privilege_mapping(user)` | eval event_time = strftime(strptime(loggedTime, "%FT%TZ"), "%F %T %Z") | fillnull value="-" | table event_time "details.Workspace guid" "details.Workspace name" "details.Name{}" "details.apikeyId.tid{}" "details.udso{}.*" role user result activity is_privileged_user | rename "details.Workspace guid" as "Workspace guid", "details.Workspace name" as "Workspace name", "details.Name{}" as api_key_name, "details.apikeyId.tid{}" as api_key_id, "details.udso{}.*" as "*"

`cs_trendmicro` sourcetype=xdr_oat filter.level IN (critical) | eval event_time = strftime(strptime(detectionTime, "%FT%TZ"), "%F %T %Z") | table event_time "filter.name" "endpoint.ips{}" "endpoint.name" "filter.techniques{}" "filter.tactics{}" "detail.processFilePath" | rename filter.name as Detection, endpoint.name as "Device Name", detail.processFilePath as Processed_FilePath | fillnull value="-"
